[ ACTIVATION INFO ]

  Activation instructions:
  * A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.  
  * If you do not want to activate, just click on "Exit".
   
  * If you want to activate select Windows Loader, then click on "Begin Install"

 
[ Installation ]

  * Create bootable USB, minimum 8GB, with Rufus (attached) 
    or burn to DVD at slow speed. 
 

  Hope you will enjoy this release!

  Regards,
